alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 3:26PM EDT until July 30 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Richland County in north central Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Northwestern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 325 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Savannah, or 7 miles northwest of Ashland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Ashland, West Salem, Hayesville, Savannah, Polk, Sullivan, Jeromesville, Bailey Lakes, Congress, Rowsburg, Nova, Mohicanville, Nankin, Reedsburg, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
